text: Luz Elena Ruiz Bejarano (born November 30, 1936), more commonly known by her stage name Lucha Villa, is a Mexican singer and actress. She was born in Camargo, Chihuahua. Her music genre isRegional Mexican. Her best known role is as Isabel in the 1972 movie National Mechanics. ==References== ==Other websites== * Discography * * Filmography Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican singers Category:Mexican television actors Category:Mexican voice actors Category:Actors from Chihuahua (state)
title: Lucha Villa
